mapper.select: select eventNo, eventSubject, to_char(eventStart, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventStart, to_char(eventEnd, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventEnd, eventImg1 from event where to_date(eventEnd, 'YY-MM-DD')>sysdate order by eventNo desc
select eventNo, eventSubject, to_char(eventStart, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventStart, to_char(eventEnd, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventEnd from event where sysdate>to_date(eventEnd, 'YY-MM-DD') order by eventNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into event(eventNo, eventSubject, eventContent, eventStart, eventEnd, eventImg1, eventImg2) values(eventsq.nextval, #{eventSubject}, #{eventContent}, #{eventStart}, #{eventEnd}, #{eventImg1}, #{eventImg2})
mapper.select: select eventNo, eventSubject, eventContent, eventImg1, eventImg2, to_char(eventStart, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventStart, to_char(eventEnd, 'yyyy-mm-dd') eventEnd from event where eventNo=#{param1}
